content: the increases as this will blend in better with the chain stitch sizes xs k1 kfb 4 times *k2 kfb k1 kfb repeat from * to last 4 sts k1 kfb 2 times 228 sts size s *k1 kfb k1 kfb k2 kfb repeat from * to end of round 240 sts size m *k1 kfb repeat from * to end of round 252 sts size l * k1 kfb 14 times kfb repeat from * to end of round 264 sts size xl * k1 kfb 6 times kfb repeat from * to last 11 sts k1 kfb 5 times k1 276 sts rounds 10-17 work the 8 rounds of the lace repeat pattern 38 40 42 44 46 times across round using either lace chart or written instructions rounds 18-25 repeats rounds 1-8 round 26 third increase round size xs * k4 kfb 3 times k3 kfb repeat from * to end of round 276 sts size s *k3 kfb repeat from * to end of round 300 sts size m *k3 kfb k2 kfb repeat from * to end of round 324 sts size l k1 *k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 kfb repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 342 sts size xl k1 k3 kfb 3 times *k2 kfb repeat from * to last 12 sts k3 kfb 3 times 366 sts rounds 27-34 repeat rounds 10-17 for second lace section rounds 35-42 repeat rounds 1-8 rounds 43-50 repeat rounds 10-17 for third lace section rounds 51-58 repeat rounds 1-8 rounds 59 4th increase round size xs k2 kfb *k6 kfb k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 318 sts size s *k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 350 sts size m *k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 378 sts size l k2 kfb *k5 kfb repeat from * to last 3 sts k2 kfb 400 sts size xl *k4 kfb repeat from * to last 6 sts k6 438 sts knit even in stockinette stitch till work measures 7 5 7 75 8 8 25 8 5 or 19 20 20 21 22 cm at the centre front starting from the cast on edge here is a chance for you to customize the fit as yoke depth will depend more on height than circumference put half you stitches onto a second needle and try your yoke on it should reach comfortably to to your underarm where you will be casting on some extra stitches to complete the body dividing sleeves and body this next round will put your sleeve stitches on hold and cast on extra stitches for the underarm k51 58 62 65 72 sts put next 58 60 66 70 76 sts on a waste yarn for first sleeve turn work to wrong side and cable cast on 12 12 14 16 16 sts turn to right side and k101 115 123 130 143 sts put next 58 60 66 70 76 sts on
